ValidationRule.description: Shipping_State_Province__c should be ISO2 code to generate shipping label
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( StoreRetailCode__c ='UE4', LEN( Shipping_State_Province__c ) != 2, NOT( ISBLANK( Shipping_State_Province__c ) ), NOT( ISNULL(Shipping_State_Province__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter ISO2 Code for Shipping State/Province
